text.div:
Care Connect Language Ability Mode

A ValueSet that identifies the mode the patient can communicate in, representing the method of expression of the language.

Copyright Statement: Copyright © 2016 HL7 UK

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/CodeSystem/CareConnect-LanguageAbilityMode-1

name: Care Connect Language Ability Mode
description: A ValueSet that identifies the mode the patient can communicate in, representing the method of expression of the language.
